page.title: 09HOME LAUNDRY:NORTH NORFOLK
page.content: There are two models,upright and cylindrical, both work on the principle of suction. The upright model is pushed, the dirt is sucked into a bag fixed to the handle. When full the disposable bag is removed and replaced by a new one. The cylindrical model is pulled along with the disposable bag in the cylinder,, the dirt is sucked through a long hose. Both models have extra attachments for different types of cleaning, carpets, vinyl or wood floors, curtains and upholstery. There can be very few homes in the area which do not possess a vacuum cleaner. {HOME LAUNDRY,NORTH NORFOLK. Washing clothes - Washing machines. There are two main types Twin tub and Automatic. Twin tubs have two drum shaped compartments.
